title: OMR-Sheet-Evaluation-System
about: Developed cost-effective OMR System using OpenCV, automating grading through advanced image processing for accurate evaluations with clear feedback.

title: T20-World-Cup-Data-Analytics
about: Created a Power BI report to identify the top 11 players for a T20 cricket team by scraping data from ESPNCricinfo and evaluating performance metrics.

title: Diabetes-Prediction
about: This project predicts diabetes using features like pregnancies, insulin, age, and BMI, sourced from Kaggle and employing a random forest classifier for accurate prediction.

title: Portfolio-Website
about: Responsive portfolio website showcasing projects and skills, built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript for optimal performance and user experience.

title: Download-GeeksforGeeks-Articles
about: Developed Streamlit app enables users to download GeeksForGeeks articles as PDFs using their article URLs.

title: Movie-Review
about: Movie review website that allows users to search for movies and view their details, including ratings and overviews.
2048 is a sliding puzzle game where players merge tiles to reach the 2048 tile.

title: Simon-Game
about: Classic Simon game implementation where players must remember and repeat sequences of colors.

title: Stopwatch-Timer
about: This C++ programming project creates a stopwatch/timer application with start, stop, and reset functionalities.

title: Rock-Paper-Scissors
about: This C programming project implements a simple Rock-Paper-Scissors game where the user plays against the computer.

title: Guessing-Game
about: This C programming project involves creating a number guessing game where the player tries to guess a randomly generated number within a specified range.
